title: (x) Vida simples font - News Gothic {Dav}
content:
Could someone help me to know what fonts are this. Tx in advanced.

 [‹ (x) dabs.com logo - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180726/http:/typophile.com/node/14987 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for scripts similar to the illy logotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180726/http:/typophile.com/node/14898 "Go to next forum topic")
author: helder araujo

comments.content:
’News Gothic’ _( ’Trade Gothic’ )_, _probably_..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180726/http:/www.formlos.net/)

—————  
I am not even old, but I am back and even slightly tanned :)

\> _I am not even old, but I am back and even slightly tanned.. :)_

Jeez, everyone wants to get into the act...  
or as Jimmy Durante would say, “I’m mortified... hachachacha!” :¬)

———————————————————————  
Yes, I’m old, but I don’t get no respect!

I am sorry, Norbert..  
_I only wanted to post one of these, once.. ( Well, twice, but thats it.. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628180726/http:/www.formlos.net/)

—————  
This is my last ever line below the line, I am sorry and I DO respect Norbert Florendo

Apologies accepted...  
you are now an honorary old person.

———————————————————————  
Your company is welcomed below the line.

“———————————————————————  
Your company is welcomed below the line.”

Does this mean you also welcome lining figures?  
:-)

ChrisL

Thanks for the font, mates.  
It was intereting to see the affair going on as well ;)

cheers  
h
